      • prepareAttributeValueMapForWorkItems

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>> prepareAttributeValueMapForWorkItems(java.util.List<TAttributeValueBean> attributeValueBeanList,
                                                                                                                     java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> customOptionIDs,
                                                                                                                     java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer>> externalOptionsMap)
        Prepares a map of maps with attributeValueBeans: - key: workItemKey - value: map - key: fieldID_parameterCode - value: attributeValueBean or list of attributeValueBeans (custom and system selects because they might be multiple) attributeValueBeanList contains attributeValueBeans for the more workItems
        Parameters:
        attributeValueBeanList - list of attributeValueBeans
        customOptionIDs - output parameter for gathering the optionIDs
        Returns:
